00023 #define __USE_FILE_OFFSET64
00024 
00025 #include <errno.h>
00026 #include <fcntl.h>
00027 #include <stdio.h>
00028 #include <stdlib.h>
00029 #include <string.h>
00030 #include <sys/ioctl.h>
00031 #include <sys/mman.h>
00032 #include <sys/types.h>
00033 #include <sys/stat.h>
00034 #include <unistd.h>
00035 #include <linux/types.h>
00036 
00037 #include <libcfs/util/ioctl.h>
00038 #include <lnet/lnetctl.h>
00039 
00040 struct ioc_dev {
00041         const char * dev_name;
00042         int dev_fd;
00043         int dev_major;
00044         int dev_minor;
00045 };
00046 
00047 static struct ioc_dev ioc_dev_list[10];
00048 
00049 struct dump_hdr {
00050         int magic;
00051         int dev_id;
00052         unsigned int opc;
00053 };
00054 
00055 /* Catamount has no <linux/kdev_t.h>, so just define it here */
00056 #ifndef MKDEV
00057 # define MKDEV(a,b) (((a) << 8) | (b))
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 static int
00061 open_ioc_dev(int dev_id)
00062 {
00063         const char * dev_name;
00064 
00065         if (dev_id < 0 ||
00066             dev_id >= sizeof(ioc_dev_list) / sizeof(ioc_dev_list[0]))
00067                 return -EINVAL;
00068 
00069         dev_name = ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_name;
00070         if (dev_name == NULL) {
00071                 fprintf(stderr, "unknown device id: %d\n", dev_id);
00072                 return -EINVAL;
00073         }
00074 
00075         if (ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_fd < 0) {
00076                 int fd = open(dev_name, O_RDWR);
00077 
00078                 /* Make the /dev/ node if we need to */
00079                 if (fd < 0 && errno == ENOENT) {
00080                         if (mknod(dev_name, S_IFCHR|S_IWUSR|S_IRUSR,
00081                                   MKDEV(ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_major,
00082                                         ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_minor)) == 0)
00083                                 fd = open(dev_name, O_RDWR);
00084                         else
00085                                 fprintf(stderr, "mknod %s failed: %s\n",
00086                                         dev_name, strerror(errno));
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 if (fd < 0) {
00090                         fprintf(stderr, "opening %s failed: %s\n"
00091                                 "hint: the kernel modules may not be loaded\n",
00092                                 dev_name, strerror(errno));
00093                         return fd;
00094                 }
00095                 ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_fd = fd;
00096         }
00097 
00098         return ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_fd;
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 int l_ioctl(int dev_id, unsigned int opc, void *buf)
00103 {
00104         int fd, rc;
00105 
00106         fd = open_ioc_dev(dev_id);
00107         if (fd < 0)
00108                 return fd;
00109 
00110         rc = ioctl(fd, opc, buf);
00111 
00112         return rc;
00113 }
00114 
00115 /* register a device to send ioctls to.  */
00116 int
00117 register_ioc_dev(int dev_id, const char *dev_name, int major, int minor)
00118 {
00119 
00120         if (dev_id < 0 ||
00121             dev_id >= sizeof(ioc_dev_list) / sizeof(ioc_dev_list[0]))
00122                 return -EINVAL;
00123 
00124         unregister_ioc_dev(dev_id);
00125 
00126         ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_name = dev_name;
00127         ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_fd = -1;
00128         ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_major = major;
00129         ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_minor = minor;
00130 
00131         return dev_id;
00132 }
00133 
00134 void
00135 unregister_ioc_dev(int dev_id)
00136 {
00137         if (dev_id < 0 ||
00138             dev_id >= sizeof(ioc_dev_list) / sizeof(ioc_dev_list[0]))
00139                 return;
00140 
00141         if (ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_name != NULL &&
00142             ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_fd >= 0)
00143                 close(ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_fd);
00144 
00145         ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_name = NULL;
00146         ioc_dev_list[dev_id].dev_fd = -1;
00147 }
00148 
00149 static inline size_t libcfs_ioctl_packlen(struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data)
00150 {
00151         size_t len = sizeof(*data);
00152 
00153         len += (data->ioc_inllen1 + 7) & ~7;
00154         len += (data->ioc_inllen2 + 7) & ~7;
00155         return len;
00156 }
00157 
00158 int libcfs_ioctl_pack(struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data, char **pbuf,
00159                                     int max)
00160 {
00161         char *ptr;
00162         struct libcfs_ioctl_data *overlay;
00163         data->ioc_hdr.ioc_len = libcfs_ioctl_packlen(data);
00164         data->ioc_hdr.ioc_version = LIBCFS_IOCTL_VERSION;
00165 
00166         if (*pbuf != NULL && libcfs_ioctl_packlen(data) > max)
00167                 return 1;
00168         if (*pbuf == NULL)
00169                 *pbuf = malloc(data->ioc_hdr.ioc_len);
00170         if (*pbuf == NULL)
00171                 return 1;
00172         overlay = (struct libcfs_ioctl_data *)*pbuf;
00173         memcpy(*pbuf, data, sizeof(*data));
00174 
00175         ptr = overlay->ioc_bulk;
00176         if (data->ioc_inlbuf1 != NULL) {
00177                 memcpy((char *)ptr, (const char *)data->ioc_inlbuf1,
00178                        data->ioc_inllen1);
00179                 ptr += ((data->ioc_inllen1 + 7) & ~7);
00180         }
00181         if (data->ioc_inlbuf2 != NULL) {
00182                 memcpy((char *)ptr, (const char *)data->ioc_inlbuf2,
00183                        data->ioc_inllen2);
00184                 ptr += ((data->ioc_inllen2 + 7) & ~7);
00185         }
00186 
00187         return 0;
00188 }
00189 
00190 void
00191 libcfs_ioctl_unpack(struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data, char *pbuf)
00192 {
00193         struct libcfs_ioctl_data *overlay = (struct libcfs_ioctl_data *)pbuf;
00194         char *ptr;
00195 
00196         /* Preserve the caller's buffer pointers */
00197         overlay->ioc_inlbuf1 = data->ioc_inlbuf1;
00198         overlay->ioc_inlbuf2 = data->ioc_inlbuf2;
00199 
00200         memcpy(data, pbuf, sizeof(*data));
00201         ptr = &overlay->ioc_bulk[0];
00202 
00203         if (data->ioc_inlbuf1 != NULL) {
00204                 memcpy((char *)data->ioc_inlbuf1, (const char *)ptr,
00205                        data->ioc_inllen1);
00206                 ptr += ((data->ioc_inllen1 + 7) & ~7);
00207         }
00208         if (data->ioc_inlbuf2 != NULL) {
00209                 memcpy((char *)data->ioc_inlbuf2, (const char *)ptr,
00210                        data->ioc_inllen2);
00211                 ptr += ((data->ioc_inllen2 + 7) & ~7);
00212         }
00213 }
